Actions.Text: AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO HIGHER EDUCATION

Title: Prohibits elementary and secondary schools from withholding student transcripts for failure to pay tuition
Summary: Prohibits elementary schools and secondary schools from withholding student transcripts for failure to pay tuition.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to prohibiting elementary schools and secondary schools from withholding student transcripts for failure to pay tuition
